name: Storm Drain
summary: The user is immune to all Water-type attacks and raises the Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage. In Double and Triple Battles, Storm Drain will draw in all water moves.
viability: Storm Drain is the Water-equivalent of Lightning Rod, and both are great abilities. Storm Drain adds an immunity, as well as an increase to Special Attack, which really help Pokémon like Gastrodon.
